channel.title: One Great Moment.com
channel.description: A podcast home for everybody's greatest stories.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast home for everybody's best stories
channel.itunes:author: Bill McKinney
channel.itunes:summary:
See our website, One Great Moment.com, for the big picture. We offer a home for anyone and everyone's greatest stories. It certainly seems that the tiny details of anyone's life - little glimpses into another psyche - are capable of absorbing us. Add a little humor, the occasional insight, something we can all relate to, or have always been curious about, and you've got sound worth sharing. And why not step it up a notch? Let's go for the big story - that one really great moment we've all had.
Supposedly there's one novel in every life, virtually none of which are going to get written (at least if you're like us.) But how hard can it be to share your one great tale? The one the rest of us would all love to hear... and watch in our mind's eye?
Listen to enjoy a sampling of great moments, and join us by contributing yours.

item.title: One Great Moment Introduction
item.author: Bill@onegreatmoment.com
item.itunes:author: Chicken Bill
item.description: The audio introduction to OneGreatMoment.com, a home for everybody's greatest stories.
item.itunes:subtitle: A short introduction to One Great moment.com
item.itunes:summary: Two minutes on why we should share our greatest moments.
item.itunes:keywords: memoir, adventure, great moments, life lessons, climbing, adventures, favorite memories, mountaineering, flying, bush pilot, alaska, travel, wilderness, family stories, denali

item.title: Bird Man of Colombia
item.author: Bill@onegreatmoment.com
item.itunes:author: Chicken Bill
item.itunes:subtitle: Early South American hangliding (mis)adventures
item.itunes:summary: A strange quest for airborne (mis)adventure. Toting a hang glider down the length of South America in search of fame, thrills, and something vaguely how-you-say?... spiritual.
item.description: A strange quest for airborne (mis)adventure. Toting a hang glider down the length of South America in search of fame, thrills, and something vaguely how-you-say?... spiritual.
item.itunes:keywords: Travel, hang gliding, adventure, flying, South America

item.title: Somebody's Sacred Mountains
item.description: Wide-eyed innocents on an Andean mountaineering expedition encounter reclusive natives, big unclimbed walls, disappearing diplomats, and the US marines.
item.author: Bill@onegreatmoment.com
item.itunes:author: Chicken Bill
item.itunes:subtitle: Climbing in Colombia: Low budget, high altitude, strange events
item.itunes:summary: Wide-eyed innocents on an Andean mountaineering expedition encounter reclusive natives, big unclimbed walls, disappearing diplomats, and the US marines.
item.itunes:keywords: climbing, mountaineering, travel, south america, colombia, adventure

item.title: A Flight Around Denali
item.description: A "virtually" clear day in the Alaska Range gives us the opportunity to fly completely around Mt. McKinley, taking in the magnificent glaciers, the stunning North Face of the mountain, the breathtaking Ruth Gorge, and the grand snowy peaks of Denali National Park. Lots of climbing history and geology. (Verging on the educational, but hey, can't there be great informational moments?)
item.author: Bill@onegreatmoment.com
item.itunes:author: Chicken Bill
item.itunes:subtitle: Fly around Mt. McKinley in Alaska
item.itunes:summary: A "virtually" clear day in the Alaska Range gives us the opportunity to fly completely around Mt. McKinley, taking in the magnificent glaciers, the stunning North Face of the mountain, the breathtaking Ruth Gorge, and the grand snowy peaks of Denali National Park. Lots of climbing history and geology. (Verging on the educational, but hey, can't there be great informational moments?)
item.itunes:keywords: flying, bush pilot, travel, Alaska, Denali, Mt. McKinley

item.title: An Alaskan Welcome (Earthquake)
item.description: In 1964 The largest earthquake in North American history rocked Alaska, changing many things, including the Richardson family, forever. It was the day they moved to Anchorage -- and a day that shook many solid foundations.
item.author: Bill@onegreatmoment.com
item.itunes:author: The Richardson Family
item.itunes:subtitle: The great Alaskan earthquake
item.itunes:summary: In 1964 The largest earthquake in North American history rocked Alaska, changing lots of things, including the Richardson family, forever. It was the day they moved to Anchorage -- and a day that shook many solid foundations.

item.title: A Sea Story
item.description: During the summer of 1975 a budding musician tries his hand at commercial fishing, with good and bad results. Somehow the music survives. Story and music by Guy Greider.
item.author: GuyGreider@onegreatmoment.com
item.itunes:author: Guy Greider
item.itunes:subtitle: A Sea Story
item.itunes:summary: During the summer of 1975 a budding musician tries his hand at commercial fishing, with good and bad results. Somehow the music survives. Story and music by Guy Greider.
